title: Remove the [Preserve] attribute
body:
**Description of Change**

Remove the `[Preserve]` attribute. Since #1209, we no longer use reflection and the linker can go ahead and start removing things.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Related to issue #1209 

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
